summary: Comprehensive testing of CRM system completed. Backend APIs show 91.7% success rate with 22/24 tests passing. Frontend UI testing successful with all major flows working including registration, login, client management, user records, appointments, and navigation.

minor_bugs.issue: Login test failed with 401 - may be due to test timing or user creation sequence
minor_bugs.impact: Low - registration and authentication flow works in frontend

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_bugs.impact: Very low - proper authentication blocking works

design_issues.issue: Nested button elements causing HTML validation warnings
Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: User Records (cartillas) with checklist fields (dl, checks, ssn, itin)
Admin user management and performance metrics
SMS integration (mocked - documents and appointment links)
Frontend login page with language toggle (EN/ES)
Dashboard with stats cards and charts
Agenda page with calendar and appointment management
